description:
This handy kit has everything you need to bleed one-way Shimano brakes. From brifters to standard levers, this kit has everything (but the brake fluid) needed to get your brakes feeling like new.

  • Includes: TL-BR001 disc brake syringe, TL-BR002 bleeding pot with stopper for road brakes, TL-BR003 bleeding pot with stoppr MTB brakes, and 4 types of bleeding spacers
name: Shimano TL-BR Professional Disc Brake Bleed Kit
